# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the countdown.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: LocalizedStringResource
```

## Creates a pause button

- **init(title:pauseButton:)**: Creates a countdown with an optional pause button.
- **pauseButton**: The pause button for a countdown timer.

items.description: Creates a countdown with an optional pause button.
items.name: init(title:pauseButton:)

items.description: The pause button for a countdown timer.
items.name: pauseButton

title: title
